publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7010 Hugh Henry: Parking Charges at the Royal Alexandria Hospital, Paisley—That the Parliament notes what it considers to be the chaos and the major inconvenience to staff and residents that has been caused by changes to the parking arrangements at the Royal Alexandra Hospital in Paisley; further regrets what it believes to be the failure of NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde and Renfrewshire Council to communicate with local residents and to produce a joint plan regarding the changes to help staff and residents, and calls on the NHS board and the local authority to identify urgently a solution that will be beneficial to staff and residents.

S3M-7010 Hugh Henry: Parking Charges at the Royal Alexandria Hospital, Paisley—That the Parliament notes what it considers to be the chaos and the major inconvenience to staff and residents that has been caused by changes to the parking arrangements at the Royal Alexandra Hospital in Paisley; further regrets what it believes to be the failure of NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde and Renfrewshire Council to communicate with local residents and to produce a joint plan regarding the changes to help staff and residents, and calls on the NHS board and the local authority to identify urgently a solution that will be beneficial to staff and residents. Supported by: Ms Wendy Alexander*
S3M-7010 Parking Charges at the Royal Alexandra Hospital, Paisley (lodged on 16 September 2010) Cathy Jamieson*
